slide.title: People from all strata of life join The Daily Star-DHL Business Awards ceremony at Sonargaon Hotel last night. Photo: Amran Hossain, Palash Khan
Tabla performers mesmerise the audience. Photo: Amran Hossain, Palash Khan
Sanjiv Mehta, managing director and CEO of Hindustan Unilever Ltd, delivers a keynote speech. Photo: Amran Hossain, Palash Khan
Artists present a dance performance at the programme. Photo: Amran Hossain, Palash Khan
Commerce Minister Tofail Ahmed speaks at the awards function. Photo: Amran Hossain, Palash Khan
Desmond Quiah, country manager of DHL Express, speaks on the occasion. Photo : Amran Hossain, Palash Khan
